title: Morita equivalences between cyclotomic KLR algebras in types $\mathtt{C}_\infty$ and $\mathtt{A}_\infty$
summary: We prove that level one cyclotomic KLR algebras in type $\mathtt{C}_\infty$ are graded Morita equivalent to level two cyclotomic KLR algebras in type $\mathtt{A}_\infty$. We hence deduce the graded decomposition numbers and full submodule structures of all level one cyclotomic KLR algebras in type $\mathtt{C}_\infty$.

AI.tldr: 该论文证明了C∞型一级分圆KLR代数与A∞型二级分圆KLR代数在分级Morita等价性，并由此推导出C∞型一级分圆KLR代数的分级分解数和完整子模结构。
AI.motivation: 研究C∞型一级分圆KLR代数的表示理论，通过建立与其他类型代数的等价关系来简化分析。
AI.method: 通过证明C∞型一级分圆KLR代数与A∞型二级分圆KLR代数的分级Morita等价性，利用已知的A∞型结果来推导C∞型的表示性质。
AI.result: 成功建立了两种不同类型KLR代数之间的等价关系，并完整描述了C∞型一级分圆KLR代数的分级分解数和子模结构。
AI.conclusion: 通过Morita等价性，将复杂的C∞型代数表示问题转化为相对简单的A∞型问题，为研究这类代数提供了新的工具和视角。

title: Branching rules for irreducible supercuspidal representations of unramified $\mathrm{U}(1,1)$
comment: 37 pages, any feedback or comments are welcome :)
summary: Let $G$ denote the unramified quasi-split unitary group $\mathbb{U}(1,1)(F)$ over a $p$-adic field $F$ with residual characteristic $p \neq 2$. In this article, we determine the branching rules for all irreducible supercuspidal representations of $G$, that is, we explicitly describe their decomposition upon restriction to a fixed maximal compact subgroup $\mathcal{K}$ in terms of irreducible representations of $\mathcal{K}$. We also present two applications of these decompositions, which verify two new conjectures in the literature for $G$. Together with the results from a previous paper by the author, this article completes the description of the branching rules for all irreducible smooth representations of $G$.

AI.tldr: 本文确定了p-adic域上非分歧拟分裂酉群𝕌(1,1)(F)的所有不可约超尖表示的支解规则，并给出了两个应用验证了文献中的两个新猜想。
AI.motivation: 研究非分歧拟分裂酉群𝕌(1,1)(F)的不可约超尖表示在固定极大紧子群上的限制分解，以完成对该群所有不可约光滑表示支解规则的完整描述。
AI.method: 通过分析p-adic域上酉群𝕌(1,1)(F)的表示理论，确定其不可约超尖表示在极大紧子群𝒦上的分解模式。
AI.result: 明确描述了所有不可约超尖表示在极大紧子群𝒦上的分解，用𝒦的不可约表示表示。
AI.conclusion: 本文完成了对𝕌(1,1)(F)所有不可约光滑表示支解规则的完整描述，并验证了文献中的两个新猜想。

title: Affine Deligne-Lusztig varieties beyond the minute case
comment: 64 pages. Associated computer code under https://github.com/65537/beyond-minute
summary: Affine Deligne-Lusztig varieties in the fully Hodge-Newton decomposable (or minute) case are the only larger class of ADLVs which could be described completely in the past. Instances of them play important roles in arithmetic geometry, from Harris-Taylor's proof of the local Langlands correspondence to applications in the Kudla program. We study generalizations for many of the equivalent conditions characterizing them to obtain in this way a larger class of ADLVs that still have a similarly good and computable description of their geometry. To generalize the minute condition itself, we introduce the notion of depth for a Shimura datum - the minute cases being those of depth bounded by 1, the cases we study being the ones of depth less than 2.

AI.tldr: 本文研究仿射Deligne-Lusztig簇的几何结构，将原有的完全Hodge-Newton可分解情形推广到深度小于2的情形，以获得更大一类具有良好几何描述的ADLVs。
AI.motivation: 完全Hodge-Newton可分解的仿射Deligne-Lusztig簇是过去唯一能够完全描述的较大类别，在算术几何中具有重要作用。本文旨在通过推广其等价条件，获得更大一类仍具有良好几何描述的ADLVs。
AI.method: 引入Shimura数据的深度概念，将原有的分钟情形推广到深度小于2的情形，并研究这些情形下ADLVs的几何性质。
AI.result: 成功将ADLVs的描述从深度有界于1的情形扩展到深度小于2的情形，获得了更大一类具有可计算几何描述的ADLVs。
AI.conclusion: 通过引入深度概念并推广分钟条件，本文扩展了具有良好几何描述的仿射Deligne-Lusztig簇的范围，为算术几何应用提供了更广泛的工具。

title: Maximal twisted Betti numbers of complex hyperplane arrangement complements
summary: We show that the Betti numbers of a local system on the complement of an essential complex hyperplane arrangement are maximized precisely when the local system is constant. This result answers positively a recent question of Yoshinaga and the first author.

AI.tldr: 本文证明在复超平面配置的补集中，局部系统的Betti数在常数局部系统时达到最大值，这回答了Yoshinaga和第一作者最近提出的问题。
AI.motivation: 研究复超平面配置补集中局部系统的Betti数最大化问题，验证常数局部系统是否确实能实现最大Betti数。
AI.method: 通过分析复超平面配置的拓扑性质，研究局部系统在配置补空间上的同调群结构。
AI.result: 证明了Betti数在常数局部系统时达到最大值，为Yoshinaga等人提出的问题提供了肯定答案。
AI.conclusion: 在复超平面配置补空间中，常数局部系统确实能最大化Betti数，这一结果具有重要的拓扑意义。

title: Towards Keating-Snaith's conjecture for cubic Hecke $L$-functions over the Eisenstein field
summary: A famous conjecture of Keating and Snaith asserts that central values of $L$-functions in a given family admit a log-normal distribution with a prescribed mean and variance depending on the symmetry type of the family. Based on a recent work of Radziwill and Soundararajan, we obtain a conditional lower bound towards Keating-Snaith's conjecture for a "thin" family of cubic Hecke $L$-functions over the Eisenstein field. A key new input is certain twisted estimates of the 1-level density of zeros of cubic Hecke $L$-functions, extending the previous work of David and Güloğlu, under the Generalised Riemann Hypothesis.

AI.tldr: Summary generation failed
AI.motivation: Motivation analysis unavailable
AI.method: Method extraction failed
AI.result: Result analysis unavailable
AI.conclusion: Conclusion extraction failed

title: Inverse curve problems on del Pezzo surfaces
summary: We classify the number of $k$-rational lines and conic fibrations on del Pezzo surfaces over a field $k$ in terms of relatively minimal surfaces and establish rational curve analogues of the inverse Galois problem for del Pezzo surfaces. We completely solve these problems in all degrees over all global, local and finite fields and provide new solutions of the inverse Galois problem in characteristic 2. Our results generalise well-known theorems on cubic surfaces.

AI.tldr: 本文对del Pezzo曲面上的k-有理直线和二次纤维进行分类，建立有理曲线类比的反伽罗瓦问题，并在所有度数的全局、局部和有限域上完全解决这些问题。
AI.motivation: 推广三次曲面上的著名定理，建立del Pezzo曲面上有理曲线与反伽罗瓦问题的联系，特别是在特征2的情况下提供新的解决方案。
AI.method: 通过相对极小曲面对del Pezzo曲面上的k-有理直线和二次纤维进行分类，建立有理曲线类比的反伽罗瓦问题框架。
AI.result: 在所有度数的全局、局部和有限域上完全解决了分类问题和反伽罗瓦问题，特别在特征2情况下提供了新的解。
AI.conclusion: 本文成功推广了三次曲面的相关理论，为del Pezzo曲面上的有理曲线和反伽罗瓦问题提供了完整的解决方案，特别是在特征2情况下取得了新的进展。

title: Cordial Labeling of Goldberg Snark and its related Graphs
comment: Submitted to Discrete Mathematics and Theoretical Computer Science (DMTCS)
summary: In graph theory, a Snark is a connected, bridgeless, Cubic graph that cannot be edge-colored with only three colors. Additionally, to avoid some trivial cases, a Snark is typically required to have a girth of minimum five and a cyclic connectivity of minimum four. In this paper, we investigate the Cordial labeling, for one of the modified structures of Snark graph which is known as Goldberg Snark graph. Moreover, a few special forms of Goldberg Snark graph also admit the Cordial labeling.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了Goldberg Snark图的Cordial标记问题，并发现该图的几种特殊形式也允许Cordial标记。
AI.motivation: 研究Snark图（一种无法用三种颜色进行边着色的连通、无桥、三次图）的Cordial标记问题，特别是Goldberg Snark图的变体结构。
AI.method: 调查Goldberg Snark图的Cordial标记性质，分析该图及其几种特殊形式的标记可能性。
AI.result: Goldberg Snark图允许Cordial标记，且其几种特殊形式也支持这种标记。
AI.conclusion: Goldberg Snark图及其特定变体结构具有Cordial标记性质，这为Snark图的标记问题提供了新的见解。

title: Exit path categories induced by group actions
summary: We prove a structural result concerning the exit path category associated to a manifold $M$ equipped with a smooth action of a finite group $G$. Specifically, the functor $Π: \mathsf{Exit}(M) \rightarrow \mathsf{Exit}(M/G)$ is a right fibration and $\mathsf{Enter}(M/G)$ is classified by a natural functor $\mathsf{Enter}(M/G) \rightarrow O_G$, where $O_G$ is the orbit category of $G$. The main technical result manipulates exit paths to immediately exiting paths, enabling lifts of homotopies in $M/G$ to homotopies in $M$.

AI.tldr: 本文证明了关于带有限群G光滑作用的流形M的退出路径范畴的结构结果：函子Π: Exit(M) → Exit(M/G)是右纤维化，且Enter(M/G)由自然函子Enter(M/G) → O_G分类，其中O_G是G的轨道范畴。
AI.motivation: 研究带有限群作用的流形上退出路径范畴的结构性质，特别是研究退出路径范畴在商空间下的行为。
AI.method: 通过将退出路径操作化为立即退出路径，使得在M/G中的同伦能够提升到M中的同伦。
AI.result: 证明了函子Π是右纤维化，并且Enter(M/G)由到轨道范畴O_G的自然函子分类。
AI.conclusion: 该结构结果为理解带群作用的流形上退出路径范畴的代数拓扑性质提供了重要工具。

title: Ultra-Kolyvagin systems and non-ordinary Selmer groups
summary: We develop a machine for bounding Selmer groups of Galois representations via Euler systems in "non-ordinary" settings, using Pottharst's definition of Selmer groups via Robba-ring $(\varphi, Γ)$-modules. Our approach relies on Sweeting's interpretation of Kolyvagin derivative classes via non-principal ultrafilters. We apply these results to prove new cases of the cyclotomic Iwasawa main conjecture for non-ordinary Rankin--Selberg convolutions.

AI.tldr: 开发了在非普通设置下通过欧拉系统界定Selmer群的机器，使用Pottharst通过Robba环(φ,Γ)模定义Selmer群的方法，并应用Sweeting对Kolyvagin导数类的非主超滤解释，证明了非普通Rankin-Selberg卷积的环分Iwasawa主猜想的新情况。
AI.motivation: 研究非普通设置下Selmer群的界定问题，特别是针对Rankin-Selberg卷积的环分Iwasawa主猜想。
AI.method: 使用Pottharst通过Robba环(φ,Γ)模定义Selmer群的方法，结合Sweeting对Kolyvagin导数类的非主超滤解释，开发欧拉系统来界定Selmer群。
AI.result: 证明了非普通Rankin-Selberg卷积的环分Iwasawa主猜想的新情况。
AI.conclusion: 成功开发了在非普通设置下界定Selmer群的机器，并应用于证明环分Iwasawa主猜想的新结果。

title: Around a class version of the Hodge index theorem for singular varieties
summary: We give an overview of recent developments around a characteristic class version of the Hodge index theorem for singular complex algebraic varieties. This was formulated by Brasselet-Schuermann-Yokura as a conjecture expressing the Goresky-MacPherson homology L-classes in terms of suitable Hodge-theoretic L-classes. Along the way, we clarify the relationship between several notions of L-classes appearing in the literature, but we also include many new cases for which the conjecture is true, e.g., all compact toric varieties, all (matroid) Schubert varieties, all Richardson and intersection varieties, all projective simply connected spherical varieties, and all compact complex algebraic surfaces and threefolds.

AI.tldr: 本文概述了关于奇异复代数簇的Hodge指标定理特征类版本的最新进展，特别是Brasselet-Schuermann-Yokura猜想，该猜想表达了Goresky-MacPherson同调L类与Hodge理论L类之间的关系。
AI.motivation: 研究奇异复代数簇的Hodge指标定理特征类版本，验证Brasselet-Schuermann-Yokura猜想，该猜想旨在建立Goresky-MacPherson同调L类与Hodge理论L类之间的精确关系。
AI.method: 通过澄清文献中出现的几种L类概念之间的关系，并验证该猜想在多个新情况下的成立性，包括紧致环面簇、(拟阵)舒伯特簇、Richardson簇和交簇、射影单连通球面簇，以及紧致复代数曲面和三重曲面。
AI.result: 证明了该猜想在多个新情况下成立，包括所有紧致环面簇、所有(拟阵)舒伯特簇、所有Richardson簇和交簇、所有射影单连通球面簇，以及所有紧致复代数曲面和三重曲面。
AI.conclusion: Brasselet-Schuermann-Yokura猜想在多个重要代数簇类别中得到了验证，为奇异复代数簇的Hodge指标定理特征类版本提供了更广泛的理论支持。

title: Distinguishability and linear independence for $H$-chromatic symmetric functions
summary: We study the $H$-chromatic symmetric functions $X_G^H$ (introduced in (arXiv:2011.06063) as a generalization of the chromatic symmetric function (CSF) $X_G$), which track homomorphisms from the graph $G$ to the graph $H$. We focus first on the case of self-chromatic symmetric functions (self-CSFs) $X_G^G$, making some progress toward a conjecture from (arXiv:2011.06063) that the self-CSF, like the normal CSF, is always different for different trees. In particular, we show that the self-CSF distinguishes trees from non-trees with just one exception, we check using Sage that it distinguishes all trees on up to 12 vertices, and we show that it determines the number of legs of a spider and the degree sequence of a caterpillar given its spine length. We also show that the self-CSF detects the number of connected components of a forest, again with just one exception. Then we prove some results about the power sum expansions for $H$-CSFs when $H$ is a complete bipartite graph, in particular proving that the conjecture from (arXiv:2011.06063) about $p$-monotonicity of $ω(X_G^H)$ for $H$ a star holds as long as $H$ is sufficiently large compared to $G$. We also show that the self-CSFs of complete multipartite graphs form a basis for the ring $Λ$ of symmetric functions, and we give some construction of bases for the vector space $Λ^n$ of degree $n$ symmetric functions using $H$-CSFs $X_G^H$ where $H$ is a fixed graph that is not a complete graph, answering a question from (arXiv:2011.06063) about whether such bases exist. However, we show that there generally do not exist such bases with $G$ fixed, even with loops, answering another question from (arXiv:2011.06063). We also define the $H$-chromatic polynomial as an analogue of the chromatic polynomial, and ask when it is the same for different graphs.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了H-色对称函数X_G^H，这是色对称函数的推广，追踪从图G到图H的同态。重点研究了自色对称函数X_G^G，在区分不同树的自色对称函数方面取得进展，证明了自色对称函数能区分树与非树（只有一个例外），验证了在12个顶点以内的树都能被区分，并证明了自色对称函数能确定蜘蛛图的腿数和毛毛虫图的度序列。
AI.motivation: 推广色对称函数到H-色对称函数，研究其区分图结构的能力，特别是验证关于自色对称函数能区分不同树的猜想，并探索H-色对称函数在构造对称函数基方面的应用。
AI.method: 使用数学证明和Sage软件验证，研究自色对称函数对树结构的区分能力，分析完全二部图情形下的幂和展开，构造对称函数环的基，并定义H-色多项式。
AI.result: 证明了自色对称函数能区分树与非树（只有一个例外），验证了12个顶点以内的树都能被区分，确定了蜘蛛图的腿数和毛毛虫图的度序列，证明了完全多部图的自色对称函数构成对称函数环的基，构造了使用H-色对称函数的对称函数空间基。
AI.conclusion: H-色对称函数是色对称函数的有力推广，在区分图结构和构造对称函数基方面具有重要应用价值，但对固定图G构造基一般不可行。

title: Nilpotence of $η$ in étale motivic spectra
summary: We show that every object of the stable étale motivic homotopy category over any scheme is $η$-complete. In some cases we show that in fact the fourth power of $η$ is null, whereas the third power of $η$ is always nonvanishing, similar to the situation in topology.

AI.tldr: 本文证明了在任何概形上的稳定étale motivic同伦范畴中的每个对象都是η-完备的。在某些情况下，η的四次幂为零，而η的三次幂总是非零，这与拓扑学中的情况类似。
AI.motivation: 研究稳定étale motivic同伦范畴中对象的η-完备性，探索与拓扑学中类似的现象。
AI.method: 使用稳定étale motivic同伦理论的方法，分析η算子的幂次性质。
AI.result: 证明了所有对象都是η-完备的，在某些情况下η⁴=0而η³≠0。
AI.conclusion: 稳定étale motivic同伦范畴中的η-完备性性质与拓扑学中的情况具有相似性，η³总是非零而η⁴在某些情况下为零。

title: Sporadic points on $X_0(N)$
summary: We determine all integers $N$ for which the modular curve $X_0(N)$ admits a sporadic CM point (of any degree), as well as all $N$ for which $X_0(N)$ admits a sporadic point, whether CM or non-CM. In a sense, our results generalize the classification of isogenies of elliptic curves over $\Q$ due to Mazur and Kenku: their work determines the $X_0(N)$ with degree 1 sporadic points, whereas we classify all $X_0(N)$ that have a sporadic point of arbitrary degree.

AI.tldr: 该论文确定了所有整数N，使得模曲线X₀(N)存在任意度数的散点CM点，以及所有存在散点（无论CM还是非CM）的X₀(N)。这推广了Mazur和Kenku关于椭圆曲线同源分类的工作。
AI.motivation: 推广Mazur和Kenku关于椭圆曲线同源分类的工作，从仅考虑度数1的散点扩展到任意度数的散点分类。
AI.method: 通过模曲线X₀(N)的理论，分析其上的散点（包括CM点和非CM点）的存在条件。
AI.result: 确定了所有使得X₀(N)存在散点CM点的整数N，以及所有存在散点（CM或非CM）的X₀(N)。
AI.conclusion: 完成了对模曲线X₀(N)上散点的完整分类，这是Mazur和Kenku工作的自然推广。

title: Higher Nash blow-ups and Nobile theorem
summary: We study the higher Nash blow-ups introduced by T. Yasuda and investigate the higher version of the classical Nobile's theorem. In particular, we give a characteristic free proof of the higher Nobile's theorem for the graded case. We also give a proof for the 2nd order Nash blow-ups in characteristic zero.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了Yasuda引入的高阶Nash blow-ups，并探讨了经典Nobile定理的高阶版本。作者给出了分级情况下的高阶Nobile定理的特征无关证明，以及在特征零情况下二阶Nash blow-ups的证明。
AI.motivation: 研究高阶Nash blow-ups并建立高阶版本的Nobile定理，为代数几何中的奇点解消问题提供新的理论工具。
AI.method: 采用特征无关的方法证明分级情况下的高阶Nobile定理，同时针对特征零情况专门研究二阶Nash blow-ups。
AI.result: 成功给出了分级情况下高阶Nobile定理的特征无关证明，以及特征零情况下二阶Nash blow-ups的证明。
AI.conclusion: 本文建立了高阶Nash blow-ups的理论基础，为相关领域的研究提供了重要的数学工具和理论支持。

title: On the dib-chromatic number of a digraph
summary: An acyclic coloring of a digraph that maximizes the number of colors such that each color class has a vertex pointing to all other classes and a vertex pointing to it from all other classes is known as the dib-chromatic number of a digraph. In this paper, we answer the question about the existence of the dib-chromatic number and study the dib-chromatic number of bipartite digraphs.

AI.tldr: 本文研究有向图的dib-色数，证明了其存在性，并特别研究了二分有向图的dib-色数。
AI.motivation: 研究有向图中存在一种无环着色，使得每个颜色类都有一个顶点指向所有其他类，且有一个顶点被所有其他类指向，这种着色的最大颜色数称为dib-色数。本文旨在回答dib-色数是否存在的问题。
AI.method: 通过理论分析和证明，探讨dib-色数的存在性，并专门研究二分有向图中dib-色数的性质。
AI.result: 证明了dib-色数的存在性，并获得了关于二分有向图dib-色数的相关结果。
AI.conclusion: dib-色数确实存在，且在二分有向图中具有特定的性质和值。

title: Categorification of sheaf theory
summary: We discuss a systematic procedure for categorifying presentable six-functor formalisms. Our main result produces, given the input of a representation of the $\infty$-category of correspondences of an $\infty$-category with finite limits $\mathcal{C}$, a compatible sequence of representations of the $(\infty,n)$-category of correspondences of $\mathcal{C}$ for every $n \geq 1$. As an application, we explain a general recipe for constructing topological field theories.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种系统方法来分类可呈现的六函子形式体系，主要结果是从具有有限极限的∞-范畴C的对应关系∞-范畴表示出发，构造出兼容的对应关系(∞,n)-范畴表示序列。
AI.motivation: 为了系统化地分类六函子形式体系，并构建拓扑场论的一般构造方法。
AI.method: 通过从具有有限极限的∞-范畴C的对应关系∞-范畴表示出发，系统性地构造兼容的对应关系(∞,n)-范畴表示序列。
AI.result: 成功构建了从对应关系∞-范畴表示到对应关系(∞,n)-范畴表示序列的兼容构造。
AI.conclusion: 该方法为分类六函子形式体系提供了系统框架，并为构建拓扑场论提供了通用构造方案。

title: Irreducibility of Newton strata in Picard modular surfaces and split local Galois representations
summary: We compute the monodromy group of the closure of the non-ordinary Newton stratum of the special fiber of the Picard modular surface at a split prime and prove the irreducibility of it. As an arithmetic application, we prove that for a Picard modular form, the existence of companion forms is equivalent to the splitting properties of the associated local Galois representation. This is an analogue of a theorem due to Breuil and Emerton on companion forms of modular forms.

AI.tldr: 本文计算了分裂素数下Picard模曲面特殊纤维的非寻常Newton层的闭包的单值群，并证明了其不可约性。作为算术应用，证明了Picard模形式存在伴随形式等价于相关局部Galois表示的分裂性质。
AI.motivation: 研究Picard模曲面在分裂素数下的非寻常Newton层的几何性质，并建立模形式与Galois表示之间的对应关系，类似于Breuil和Emerton在模形式方面的定理。
AI.method: 计算Picard模曲面特殊纤维的非寻常Newton层闭包的单值群，分析其不可约性，并将结果应用于Picard模形式的伴随形式与局部Galois表示分裂性质的关系研究。
AI.result: 证明了非寻常Newton层闭包的单值群不可约，并建立了Picard模形式存在伴随形式与局部Galois表示分裂性质的等价关系。
AI.conclusion: 成功建立了Picard模形式与Galois表示之间的对应关系，为Picard模曲面的几何性质研究提供了新的算术应用视角。

title: Brauer groups of abelian varieties over fields of finite characteristic
summary: We study the Brauer group of an abelian variety A over an algebraically closed field of characteristic p focusing on the p-primary torsion, the key part of which is a certain quasi-algebraic unipotent group U_A. We determine its dimension and obtain a sharp upper bound for its p-exponent. The isogeny class of U_A is classified for abelian varieties A of dimension at most 3. For principally polarised abelian varieties we compute the dimension of the p-torsion subgroup of U_A in terms of the Ekedahl--Oort type of A.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究代数闭域上阿贝尔簇的Brauer群，重点关注p-主挠部分，特别是拟代数单群U_A的维度、p-指数上界，以及对维数≤3的阿贝尔簇进行同源分类。
AI.motivation: 研究阿贝尔簇Brauer群中p-主挠部分的结构特性，特别是拟代数单群U_A的性质，这对于理解阿贝尔簇的算术性质具有重要意义。
AI.method: 使用代数几何方法分析阿贝尔簇的Brauer群结构，通过拟代数单群U_A来研究p-主挠部分，并利用Ekedahl-Oort类型进行分类。
AI.result: 确定了U_A的维度，获得了其p-指数的尖锐上界，对维数≤3的阿贝尔簇完成了同源分类，并为主要极化阿贝尔簇计算了U_A的p-挠子群维度。
AI.conclusion: 该研究深入揭示了阿贝尔簇Brauer群中p-主挠部分的结构特性，为理解阿贝尔簇的算术性质提供了重要工具和结果。

title: VC-dimension of Salem sets over finite fields
summary:
The VC-dimension, introduced by Vapnik and Chervonenkis in 1968 in the context of learning theory, has in recent years provided a rich source of problems in combinatorial geometry. Given $E\subseteq \mathbb{F}_q^d$ or $E\subseteq \mathbb{R}^d$, finding lower bounds on the VC-dimension of hypothesis classes defined by geometric objects such as spheres and hyperplanes is equivalent to constructing appropriate geometric configurations in $E$. The complexity of these configurations increases exponentially with the VC-dimension.
  These questions are related to the Erdős distance problem and the Falconer problem when considering a hypothesis class defined by spheres. In particular, the Erdős distance problem over finite fields is equivalent to showing that the VC-dimension of translates of a sphere of radius $t$ is at least one for all nonzero $t\in \mathbb{F}_q$. In this paper, we show that many of the existing techniques for distance problems over finite fields can be extended to a much broader context, not relying on the specific geometry of circles and spheres. We provide a unified framework which allows us to simultaneously study highly structured sets such as algebraic curves, as well as random sets.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一个统一框架，将有限域上的距离问题技术扩展到更广泛的几何配置，用于研究球体和超平面等几何对象定义的假设类的VC维度下界。
AI.motivation: VC维度在组合几何中产生了丰富的问题，现有技术主要依赖于圆和球体的特定几何特性，需要开发不依赖具体几何的统一方法。
AI.method: 构建统一框架，将有限域距离问题技术扩展到更广泛背景，同时研究高度结构化集合（如代数曲线）和随机集合。
AI.result: 展示了现有距离问题技术可以扩展到不依赖圆和球体具体几何的更广泛背景，为VC维度研究提供了统一方法。
AI.conclusion: 提出的统一框架能够同时处理结构化和随机集合的VC维度问题，扩展了有限域几何配置的研究范围。

title: Regularized Products over arithmetic Schemes
summary: In this paper, we study the closed points of arithmetic schemes. We accomplish this by showing that the product of the cardinals of residue fields of closed points in an arithmetic scheme can be regularized. This regularization yields a new arithmetic invariant attached to the scheme. We compute it explicitly in several cases and find that it is always a transcendental number. This result provides a proof that the set of closed points is infinite. Our main tool is a regularization technique, which generalizes the zeta-regularization method introduced by Muñoz and Pérez.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了算术概型的闭点，通过正则化闭点剩余域基数的乘积，得到一个新的算术不变量，发现它总是超越数，从而证明闭点集合是无限的。
AI.motivation: 研究算术概型中闭点的性质，特别是证明闭点集合的无限性，并建立新的算术不变量。
AI.method: 使用正则化技术，特别是对闭点剩余域基数乘积进行正则化，该方法推广了Muñoz和Pérez引入的zeta正则化方法。
AI.result: 正则化后的乘积是一个新的算术不变量，在多个情况下被显式计算，且总是超越数。
AI.conclusion: 通过正则化闭点剩余域基数乘积得到的算术不变量总是超越数，这为闭点集合的无限性提供了证明。

title: Linear Saturation for $\mathcal N$ via Butterflies
summary:
Given a finite poset $\mathcal P$, how small can a family $\mathcal F$ of subsets of $[n]$ be such that $\mathcal F$ does not contain an induced copy of $\mathcal P$, but $\mathcal F\cup\{X\}$ contains such a copy for all $X\in\mathcal P([n])\setminus\mathcal F$? This is known as the induced saturation number of $\mathcal P$, denoted by $\text{sat}^*(n,\mathcal P)$. The main conjecture in the area is that the induced saturation number for any poset is either bounded, or linear.
  In this paper we establish linearity for the induced saturation number of the 4-point poset $\mathcal N$. Previously, it was known that $2\sqrt n\leq\text{sat}^*(n,\mathcal N)\leq 2n$. We show that $\text{sat}^*(n,\mathcal N)\geq\frac{n+6}{4}$. A crucial role in the proof is played by a structural feature of $\mathcal N$-saturated families, namely that if the family contains two antichains, one completely above the other, then it must also contain a `middle' point -- greater than one antichain and less than the other.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了有限偏序集$\mathcal P$的诱导饱和数$\text{sat}^*(n,\mathcal P)$，主要证明了4点偏序集$\mathcal N$的诱导饱和数是线性的，具体给出了下界$\frac{n+6}{4}$。
AI.motivation: 该领域的主要猜想是任何偏序集的诱导饱和数要么有界，要么是线性的。之前已知$2\sqrt n\leq\text{sat}^*(n,\mathcal N)\leq 2n$，本文旨在建立$\mathcal N$的线性性质。
AI.method: 证明中利用了$\mathcal N$-饱和族的结构特征：如果族包含两个完全上下排列的反链，则必须包含一个'中间'点——大于一个反链且小于另一个反链。
AI.result: 证明了$\text{sat}^*(n,\mathcal N)\geq\frac{n+6}{4}$，从而确立了$\mathcal N$诱导饱和数的线性性质。
AI.conclusion: 本文成功证明了4点偏序集$\mathcal N$的诱导饱和数是线性的，为该领域的主要猜想提供了重要支持。

title: Bounds for monochromatic solutions to $\{x+y,xy\}$
summary: Let $r$ be a sufficiently large positive integer, and let $N \ge \exp\exp(r^{50})$. Then any $r$-colouring of $[N]$ contains a monochromatic copy of $\{x+y,xy\}$ with $x > y > 2$.

AI.tldr: 对于足够大的正整数r和N≥exp(exp(r^50))，任何r-着色在区间[N]中都包含一个单色的{x+y, xy}形式的集合，其中x>y>2。
AI.motivation: 研究在足够大的整数集合中，对于任意r-着色，是否存在特定形式的单色集合{x+y, xy}，其中x>y>2。
AI.method: 使用组合数学和拉姆齐理论的方法，分析在足够大的整数集合[N]中，对于任意r-着色，构造或证明存在单色的{x+y, xy}集合。
AI.result: 证明了当r足够大且N≥exp(exp(r^50))时，任何r-着色在[N]中都包含一个单色的{x+y, xy}集合，其中x>y>2。
AI.conclusion: 该结果扩展了拉姆齐理论在特定算术结构上的应用，表明在足够大的整数集合中，对于任意有限着色，都存在特定形式的单色算术结构。

title: Logarithmic Jacobian ideals, quasi-ordinary hypersurfaces and equisingularity
summary: Let $(S, 0) \subset (\mathbb{C}^{d+1},0)$ be an irreducible germ of hypersurface. The germ $(S,0)$ is quasi-ordinary if $(S,0)$ has a finite projection to $(\mathbb{C}^d,0)$ which is unramified outside the coordinate hyperplanes. This implies that the normalization of $S$ is a toric singularity. One has also a monomial variety associated to $S$, which is a toric singularity with the same normalization, and with possibly higher embedding dimension. Since $(S,0)$ is quasi-ordinary, the extension of the Jacobian ideal of $S$ to the local ring of its normalization is a monomial ideal. We describe this monomial ideal by comparing it with the {\em logarithmic Jacobian ideals} of $S$ and of its associated monomial variety and we give some applications.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了拟普通超曲面奇点的性质，重点关注其正规化与关联的单项簇之间的关系，以及Jacobian理想在正规化环中的表现。
AI.motivation: 拟普通超曲面具有特殊的几何结构，其正规化是环面奇点。研究其Jacobian理想在正规化环中的行为有助于理解这类奇点的解析性质。
AI.method: 通过比较拟普通超曲面与其关联单项簇的对数Jacobian理想，描述了Jacobian理想在正规化环中的单项式结构。
AI.result: 证明了拟普通超曲面的Jacobian理想在正规化环中是单项式理想，并给出了与关联单项簇的对数Jacobian理想的具体关系。
AI.conclusion: 该方法为研究拟普通超曲面的解析性质提供了新工具，并得到了一些应用结果。

title: Hadamard Products of dual Jacobi-Trudi matrices
summary: We study positivity properties of Hadamard products of Jacobi-Trudi matrices. Maló proved that the Hadamard (entrywise) product of two totally positive upper-triangular Toeplitz matrices whose Toeplitz sequences are the coefficient sequences of real-rooted polynomials with nonpositive zeros is again totally positive. Sokal conjectured that this result can be strengthened to total monomial positivity for the Hadamard product of Jacobi-Trudi matrices. In this paper we show that Temperley-Lieb immanants are Schur positive for Hadamard products of Jacobi-Trudi matrices given by ribbon-like skew shapes. In particular, we affirm Sokal's conjecture for minors given by ribbon-like skew shapes. Moreover, we provide a manifestly positive Schur expansion for Temperley-Lieb immanants evaluated on the Hadamard product of Jacobi-Trudi matrices indexed by ribbons. In addition, for the ribbon case, we construct a corresponding representation, offering a representation-theoretic proof of the Schur positivity.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了Jacobi-Trudi矩阵Hadamard积的正性性质，证明了Temperley-Lieb不变式在带状类斜形状下的Schur正性，并给出了显式的正Schur展开式。
AI.motivation: Maló证明了具有实根多项式系数序列的完全正上三角Toeplitz矩阵的Hadamard积仍然是完全正的。Sokal猜想这一结果可以加强为Jacobi-Trudi矩阵Hadamard积的完全单项正性。
AI.method: 通过研究带状类斜形状的Jacobi-Trudi矩阵Hadamard积，分析Temperley-Lieb不变式的性质，并构造相应的表示来提供表示论证明。
AI.result: 证明了Temperley-Lieb不变式在带状类斜形状Jacobi-Trudi矩阵Hadamard积下是Schur正的，确认了Sokal猜想在带状类斜形状子式情况下的正确性。
AI.conclusion: 为带状情况提供了显式的正Schur展开式，并通过构造相应表示给出了表示论证明，深化了对Jacobi-Trudi矩阵Hadamard积正性性质的理解。

title: Bilinear forms with trace functions
summary:
We obtain non-trivial bounds for bilinear sums of trace functions below the Pólya-Vinogradov range assuming only that the geometric monodromy group of the underlying ell-adic sheaf satisfies certain simple structural properties, in contrast to previous works which handled only special cases of Kloosterman and hypergeometric sheaves.
  Our approach builds on a general "soft" stratification theorem for sums of products of trace functions, based on an idea of Junyan Xu, combined with a new robust version of the Goursat-Kolchin-Ribet criterion.

AI.tldr: 该论文提出了一种新的方法来估计迹函数双线性和的非平凡下界，突破了Pólya-Vinogradov范围，只需要底层ℓ-adic层的几何单值群满足简单的结构性质。
AI.motivation: 以往的工作只能处理Kloosterman和超几何层的特殊情况，需要开发更通用的方法来处理更广泛的迹函数双线性求和问题。
AI.method: 基于Junyan Xu的思想，建立了迹函数乘积和的通用"软"分层定理，并结合新的鲁棒版Goursat-Kolchin-Ribet准则。
AI.result: 获得了在Pólya-Vinogradov范围以下的迹函数双线性和的非平凡下界，适用于更广泛的ℓ-adic层类别。
AI.conclusion: 该方法显著扩展了可处理的迹函数范围，为更一般的双线性求和问题提供了有效的分析工具。

title: Associative Schemes and Subschemes
summary: In the preprint arXiv:2511.07900 we proved that there exists a localizing ring $A_M$ for $A$ an associative ring with unit, and $M=\oplus_{i=1}^rM_i$ a direct sum of $r\geq 1$ simple right $A$-modules. For a homomorphism of associative rings $A\rightarrow B$ we define the contraction of a simple $B$-module to $A.$ Then we define the set of aprime right $A$-modules ${\rm aSpec} A$ to be the set of simple $A$-modules together with contractions of such. When $A$ is commutative, ${\rm aSpec} A = {\rm Spec} A$. and we define a topology on ${\rm aSpec} A$ such that when $A$ is commutative, this is the Zariski topology. In the preprint \cite{S251}, we proved that when we have a topology and a localizing subcategory, there exists a sheaf of associative rings $\mathcal O_X$ on ${\rm aSpec} A,$ agreeing with the usual sheaf of rings on ${\rm Spec} A.$ In this text, we write out this construction, and we see that we can restrict the sheaf and topology to any subset $V\subseteq{\rm aSpec}$. In particular, this proves that we can use complex varieties in real algebraic geometry, by restricting in accordance with $\mathbb R\subseteq\mathbb C.$ Thus the theory of schemes over algebraically closed fields and its associative generalization can be applied to real (algebraic) geometry.

AI.tldr: 该论文构建了非交换环的谱理论，定义了aprime右A-模集合aSpec A及其拓扑结构，当A是交换环时与经典谱理论一致。通过构造层结构，将代数闭域上的概形理论推广到实代数几何中。
AI.motivation: 将交换环的谱理论和概形理论推广到非交换环的情形，使得代数闭域上的概形理论能够应用于实代数几何，特别是通过复数域到实数域的限制来实现。
AI.method: 定义局部化环A_M，构造aprime右A-模集合aSpec A及其拓扑结构，建立层结构O_X，并研究其在子集上的限制性质。
AI.result: 成功构建了非交换环的谱理论和层结构，证明了当A是交换环时与经典理论一致，并展示了如何通过限制将复数域上的理论应用于实数域。
AI.conclusion: 该工作为非交换环的几何理论提供了基础框架，使得代数闭域上的概形理论可以扩展到实代数几何领域，具有重要的理论意义和应用价值。

title: On minimum Venn diagrams
summary: An $n$-Venn diagram is a diagram in the plane consisting of $n$ simple closed curves that intersect only finitely many times such that each of the $2^n$ possible intersections is represented by a single connected region. An $n$-Venn diagram has at most $2^n-2$ crossings, and if this maximum number of crossings is attained, then only two curves intersect in every crossing. To complement this, Bultena and Ruskey considered $n$-Venn diagrams that minimize the number of crossings, which implies that many curves intersect in every crossing. Specifically, they proved that the total number of crossings in any $n$-Venn diagram is at least $L_n:=\lceil\frac{2^n-2}{n-1}\rceil$, and if this lower bound is attained then essentially all $n$ curves intersect in every crossing. Diagrams achieving this bound are called minimum Venn diagrams, and are known only for $n\leq 7$. Bultena and Ruskey conjectured that they exist for all $n\geq 8$. In this work, we establish an asympototic version of their conjecture. For $n=8$ we construct a diagram with 40 crossings, only 3 more than the lower bound $L_8=37$. Furthermore, for every $n$ of the form $n=2^k$ for some integer $k\geq 4$, we construct an $n$-Venn diagram with at most $(1+\frac{33}{8n})L_n=(1+o(1))L_n$ many crossings. Via a doubling trick this also gives $(n+m)$-Venn diagrams for all $0\leq m<n$ with at most $40\cdot 2^m$ crossings for $n=8$ and at most $(1+\frac{33}{8n})\frac{n+m}{n}L_{n+m}=(2+o(1))L_{n+m}$ many crossings for $k\geq 4$. In particular, we obtain $n$-Venn diagrams with the smallest known number of crossings for all $n\geq 8$. Our constructions are based on partitions of the hypercube into isometric paths and cycles, using a result of Ramras.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了n-Venn图中交叉点数量的最小化问题，证明了Bultena和Ruskey猜想的一个渐近版本，构造了接近理论下界的n-Venn图，特别对n=8构造了40个交叉点的图（理论下界为37），并对n=2^k形式构造了接近最优的Venn图。
AI.motivation: Bultena和Ruskey提出了n-Venn图中交叉点数量最小化的问题，并猜想对所有n≥8都存在达到理论下界L_n的最小Venn图。本文旨在验证这一猜想的渐近版本，并构造接近最优的Venn图。
AI.method: 基于超立方体到等距路径和环的划分，利用Ramras的结果构造Venn图。通过加倍技巧扩展构造，特别对n=8构造了40个交叉点的图，对n=2^k形式构造了接近理论下界的Venn图。
AI.result: 成功构造了n=8时40个交叉点的Venn图（理论下界37），对n=2^k形式构造了交叉点数量不超过(1+33/8n)L_n的Venn图，获得了所有n≥8时已知最小交叉点数量的Venn图。
AI.conclusion: 验证了Bultena和Ruskey猜想的渐近版本，构造了接近理论下界的Venn图，为n≥8时提供了目前已知最小交叉点数量的Venn图构造。

title: On a theorem of Keller over a base ring
comment: This preprint serves as the first named author's master thesis, 12 pages
summary: Let $X$ be a quasi-compact separated scheme over a base field. Keller proved a theorem stating that the cyclic homology of $X$ is canonically isomorphic to the cyclic homology of the dg category ${\sf Perf}(X)$ consisting of perfect complexes over $X$. This theorem shows the categorical nature of the cyclic homology. In this note, we generalize Keller's theorem to allow $X$ be defined over a base commutative ring.

AI.tldr: 本文推广了Keller定理，将基域上的拟紧分离概形的循环同调与完美复形的dg范畴的循环同调之间的同构关系，扩展到基环上的情况。
AI.motivation: Keller定理证明了在基域上拟紧分离概形的循环同调与完美复形的dg范畴的循环同调之间的同构关系，这显示了循环同调的范畴性质。本文旨在将这一结果推广到更一般的基环情况。
AI.method: 通过推广Keller的原始证明方法，将基域的条件放宽为一般的交换环，保持拟紧分离概形的基本假设。
AI.result: 成功证明了在基交换环上，拟紧分离概形的循环同调仍然与完美复形的dg范畴的循环同调存在典范同构。
AI.conclusion: Keller关于循环同调范畴性质的定理可以推广到基环的情况，这进一步巩固了循环同调与范畴理论之间的深刻联系。

title: The tropical galaxy of a Laman graph
summary: A Laman graph $G$ is a minimally rigid graph in dimension two, and its realization number is its number of distinct embeddings with fixed generic edge lengths. While conjectured to grow exponentially in the number of vertices of $G$, the best proven lower bound is merely $2$. Motivated by the fact that the realization number can be expressed as a tropical intersection product involving $\mathrm{Trop}(G)$, the Bergman fan of the graphic matroid of $G$, and the fact that stars of $\mathrm{Trop}(G)$ naturally lead to lower bounds thereof, we introduce the tropical galaxy of $G$ together with a galactic pairing thereon. We study structural properties of this pairing, such as under which conditions it is non-trivially subadditive, and connect it being non-zero to arboreal pairs. We also present a software package for working with tropical galaxies.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了二维最小刚性图（Laman图）的嵌入数问题，通过引入热带星系和星系配对的概念，探索了嵌入数的下界估计方法。
AI.motivation: Laman图的嵌入数在固定边长的条件下被推测为指数增长，但现有证明的下界仅为2。由于嵌入数可以表示为涉及图拟阵Bergman扇的热带交集积，且该扇的星形自然产生下界，因此需要新的方法来改进下界估计。
AI.method: 引入了热带星系和星系配对的概念，研究了该配对的结构性质，包括在什么条件下具有非平凡次可加性，并将其非零性与树状对联系起来。还开发了用于处理热带星系的软件包。
AI.result: 建立了热带星系与嵌入数下界之间的联系，发现了星系配对的结构性质与树状对的关系，为改进嵌入数下界提供了新的理论工具。
AI.conclusion: 通过热带星系和星系配对的方法，为Laman图嵌入数的下界估计开辟了新的研究途径，相关软件工具也促进了该领域的计算研究。

title: Geometric Criteria for 6-Functor Formalisms in the Setting of Pullback Formalisms
summary:
In this article, we prove various results about six-functor formalisms and morphisms between them. In particular, we show that the stable motivic homotopy theory of algebraic stacks is the universal six-functor functor formalism in a strong sense: it is initial in some category whose objects are six-functor formalisms, and whose morphisms commute with the six operations. This strengthens previous results of this form, which only showed that stable motivic homotopy theory is a six-functor formalism, and is initial, but not that the morphisms from it commute with the six operations.
  We also prove a similar result for the stable motivic homotopy theory of complex analytic stacks, and produce a Betti realization for stacks that commutes with Grothendieck's six operations, generalizing previous results of Ayoub for quasi-projective schemes.
  In order to do this, we give a generalized and enhanced account of Voevodsky's geometric criterion for six-functor formalisms. Our version of Voevodsky's principle makes sense in more general geometric contexts (not only algebraic geometry), and also provides a criterion for showing that a morphism between six-functor formalisms is compatible with the six operations.

AI.tldr: 本文证明了六函子形式体系及其态射的各种结果，特别是证明了代数栈的稳定motivic同伦论是强意义下的通用六函子形式体系，在六函子形式体系范畴中是初始对象，且态射与六运算交换。
AI.motivation: 强化先前关于稳定motivic同伦论作为六函子形式体系的结果，证明其不仅是初始对象，而且从它出发的态射与六运算交换，同时推广到复解析栈的类似结果。
AI.method: 推广和增强了Voevodsky的几何判据，使其适用于更一般的几何背景，并提供判断六函子形式体系间态射与六运算兼容性的标准。
AI.result: 证明了代数栈和复解析栈的稳定motivic同伦论分别是相应范畴中的通用六函子形式体系，并构造了与六运算交换的Betti实现。
AI.conclusion: 本文建立了稳定motivic同伦论作为六函子形式体系的强通用性，推广了Voevodsky的几何判据，为六函子形式体系理论提供了更一般的框架。

title: Multiple Rogers-Ramanujan type identities for inert quadratic orders
summary: We compute the Quot and finitized Coh zeta functions of the inert quadratic orders $\mathbb{F}_q[[T]]+T^{m}\mathbb{F}_{q^{2}}[[T]]$ for every $m\geq 1$ in terms of a $2m$-fold multisum, and then show this multisum equals an $m$-fold Bressoud sum. This proves a recent conjecture of the second author, rounding up the line of exploration in the series of work by the authors and Jiang. The equality between the $2m$-fold multisum and the $m$-fold Bressoud sum is built upon generalizing the multisum by introducing a ``ghost'' parameter $a$ to its summands. We then show that such an $a$-generalization is surprisingly $a$-independent by purely $q$-theoretic techniques. Finally, we propose a refined multisum that interpolates two versions of Quot zeta functions for all three types of quadratic orders.

AI.tldr: 该论文计算了惰性二次序的Quot和有限化Coh zeta函数，证明了一个关于2m重多重和与m重Bressoud和相等的猜想，并提出了一个精炼的多重和来插值三种类型二次序的Quot zeta函数。
AI.motivation: 证明第二作者最近提出的一个猜想，完成作者和Jiang在系列工作中探索的路线，研究惰性二次序的zeta函数性质。
AI.method: 通过引入"幽灵"参数a来推广多重和，使用纯q理论技术证明这种a推广是a无关的，构建2m重多重和与m重Bressoud和之间的等式关系。
AI.result: 成功计算了惰性二次序的Quot和有限化Coh zeta函数，证明了猜想中2m重多重和等于m重Bressoud和的关系。
AI.conclusion: 提出的精炼多重和能够插值所有三种类型二次序的两个版本的Quot zeta函数，为相关研究提供了新的工具和视角。

title: Bott manifolds of Bott--Samelson type and assemblies of ordered partitions
summary: A Bott manifold is a smooth projective toric variety having an iterated $\mathbb{C} P^1$-bundle structure. A certain family of Bott manifolds is used to understand the structure of Bott--Samelson varieties (or Bott--Samelson--Demazure--Hansen varieties), which provide desingularizations of Schubert varieties. Indeed, each Bott--Samelson variety is diffeomorphic to a Bott manifold. However, not all Bott manifolds originate from Bott--Samelson varieties. Those that do are specifically referred to as Bott manifolds of Bott--Samelson type. In this paper, we provide a characterization of Bott manifolds of Bott--Samelson type by exploring their relationship with combinatorial objects called assemblies of ordered partitions. Using this relationship, we enumerate Bott manifolds of Bott--Samelson type and describe isomorphic Bott manifolds of Bott--Samelson type in terms of assemblies of ordered partitions.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了Bott流形与Bott-Samelson型Bott流形之间的关系，通过组合对象（有序划分的组装）来刻画Bott-Samelson型Bott流形，并对其进行枚举和同构描述。
AI.motivation: Bott-Samelson簇提供了Schubert簇的消奇点，每个Bott-Samelson簇都微分同胚于一个Bott流形，但并非所有Bott流形都来自Bott-Samelson簇。本文旨在刻画那些来自Bott-Samelson簇的Bott流形（即Bott-Samelson型Bott流形）。
AI.method: 通过探索Bott-Samelson型Bott流形与称为有序划分组装（assemblies of ordered partitions）的组合对象之间的关系，来提供其刻画方法。
AI.result: 利用有序划分组装的关系，枚举了Bott-Samelson型Bott流形，并描述了同构的Bott-Samelson型Bott流形。
AI.conclusion: 本文成功通过组合方法刻画了Bott-Samelson型Bott流形，建立了与有序划分组装的关系，为理解这类特殊Bott流形的结构提供了新的视角。

title: On Wegner's 8-Coloring Theorem for Planar Graphs of Maximum Degree Three
summary: We provide a simplified proof of the following special case of Wegner's conjecture: every planar graph of maximum degree at most three admits a distance-2 coloring with at most eight colors. Our main contribution is significant simplification of the most technically challenging part of Wegner's proof: the case involving the removal of a 5-cycle.

AI.tldr: 本文提供了一个简化证明，证明了Wegner猜想的一个特例：每个最大度数不超过3的平面图都可以用最多8种颜色进行距离2着色。主要贡献是显著简化了Wegner证明中最具技术挑战性的部分——涉及5环移除的情况。
AI.motivation: 简化Wegner猜想证明中最复杂的技术部分，使证明更加简洁易懂
AI.method: 简化了Wegner原始证明中处理5环移除情况的技术细节
AI.result: 成功证明了最大度数不超过3的平面图可以用最多8种颜色进行距离2着色
AI.conclusion: 通过简化5环移除情况的证明，为Wegner猜想提供了一个更简洁的证明方法

title: Enumeration in the lattice of $q$-decreasing words
summary: We prove that the poset of $q$-decreasing words equipped with the componentwise order forms a lattice. We enumerate the join-irreducible elements for arbitrary $q>0$, and for any positive rational number $q$, we determine the number of coverings, intervals and meet-irreducible elements. The latter present the same structure as words over an alphabet of $2\lceil q\rceil+1$ letters avoiding $\lceil q\rceil^2+2\lceil q\rceil-1$ consecutive patterns of length 2. Furthermore, we analyze the asymptotic behavior of several of these quantities.

AI.tldr: 该论文证明了q-递减词在分量序下构成格结构，并系统研究了其组合性质，包括枚举不可约元素、覆盖关系、区间数量等，还分析了这些量的渐近行为。
AI.motivation: 研究q-递减词在分量序下的格结构性质，探索其组合特征和渐近行为，为组合数学中的格理论提供新的研究对象和分析方法。
AI.method: 采用组合数学和格理论的方法，通过分析q-递减词的结构特性，证明其构成格，并系统枚举各种组合不变量。
AI.result: 证明了q-递减词构成格，确定了任意q>0时不可约元素的数量，对于正有理数q计算了覆盖数、区间数和交不可约元素数，发现后者具有特定模式避免结构。
AI.conclusion: q-递减词在分量序下形成格结构，其组合性质与特定模式避免的字母表词具有相同的结构特征，为组合格理论提供了新的研究视角。

title: Characterizing the largest commutative (full and partial) transformation semigroups of certain types
summary:
Let $X$ be a finite set. Let $\mathcal{T}(X)$ be the transformation semigroup on $X$ and let $\mathcal{P}(X)$ be the partial transformation semigroup on $X$. This paper is a contribution to the problem of characterizing the largest commutative subsemigroups of $\mathcal{T}(X)$ (respectively, $\mathcal{P}(X)$). In the process of looking for these semigroups, we also characterize the largest commutative subsemigroups of idempotents of $\mathcal{T}(X)$ (respectively, $\mathcal{P}(X)$); as well as the largest commutative subsemigroups of $\mathcal{T}(X)$ (respectively, $\mathcal{P}(X)$) that contain a unique idempotent. We also provide an alternative way to determine the largest commutative nilpotent subsemigroups of $\mathcal{T}(X)$ (which were previously characterized by Cain, Malheiro and the present author); and we describe the largest commutative nilpotent subsemigroups of $\mathcal{P}(X)$.
  These results allow us to make conclusions regarding the clique numbers of the commuting graphs of $\mathcal{T}(X)$ and of $\mathcal{P}(X)$. We also determine their girths and knit degrees.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了有限集X上的变换半群和部分变换半群的最大交换子半群，包括幂等元的最大交换子半群、包含唯一幂等元的交换子半群，以及最大交换幂零子半群，并应用于分析这些半群的交换图的团数、围长和编织度。
AI.motivation: 研究变换半群和部分变换半群的最大交换子半群结构，这是半群理论中的一个基本问题，有助于理解这些重要半群的代数结构特性。
AI.method: 通过系统分析变换半群和部分变换半群的结构特性，采用代数方法和组合论证来刻画不同类型的最大交换子半群。
AI.result: 完整刻画了变换半群和部分变换半群中各类最大交换子半群的结构，包括幂等元的最大交换子半群、包含唯一幂等元的交换子半群，以及最大交换幂零子半群。
AI.conclusion: 这些结果不仅解决了半群理论中的基本问题，还为分析变换半群和部分变换半群的交换图的图论性质（如团数、围长和编织度）提供了基础。

title: A recursion for the twist polynomial of a one-point join of normal binary delta-matroids
summary: The partial-dual Euler-genus polynomial was defined by Gross, Mansour, and Tucker to analyze how the Euler genus of a ribbon graph changes under partial duality, a generalization of Euler-Poincaré duality introduced by Chmutov. The twist polynomial defined by Yan and Jin extends the partial-dual Euler-genus polynomial to a polynomial on delta-matroids. We derive a recursion formula for the twist polynomial of a one-point join of looped simple graphs -- equivalently, normal, binary delta-matroids. Our recursion applies to the partial-dual Euler-genus polynomial as a special case, where it generalizes a recursion obtained by Yan and Jin. We obtain relations for the twist polynomial on looped simple graphs evaluated at $-1/2$ and for the twist polynomial of a graph with a single looped vertex. A characterization is given for the feasible sets of the delta-matroid associated to a one-point join of looped simple graphs. We show that Yan and Jin's recursion extends to the twist polynomial on delta-matroids.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了扭多项式在单点连接环状简单图上的递归公式，该公式推广了Yan和Jin的递归结果，并应用于部分对偶欧拉亏格多项式作为特例。
AI.motivation: 研究扭多项式在单点连接环状简单图上的递归性质，以扩展部分对偶欧拉亏格多项式的理论框架，并深化对delta-拟阵的理解。
AI.method: 推导扭多项式在单点连接环状简单图上的递归公式，分析其在特定点(-1/2)的取值特性，并给出相关delta-拟阵可行集的刻画。
AI.result: 获得了扭多项式的递归公式，证明了Yan和Jin的递归可扩展到delta-拟阵上的扭多项式，并建立了单环顶点图和多点连接图的扭多项式关系。
AI.conclusion: 本文成功扩展了扭多项式的递归理论，为部分对偶欧拉亏格多项式和delta-拟阵的研究提供了新的工具和视角。
